processLatLong.name: processLatLong
processLatLong.description: Use this for processing data in workflow

processAddressDetails.name: processAddressDetails
processAddressDetails.description: Use this for processing data in workflow
processAddressDetails.processRule: function setSiteDetails(results) { for (var j = 0; j < results.length; j++) { for (var i = 0; i < results[j].address_components.length; i++) { if (results[j].address_components[i].types[0] == 'locality') { contextVar.site[0].city = results[j].address_components[i].long_name; } if (results[j].address_components[i].types[0] == 'country') { contextVar.site[0].country = results[j].address_components[i].long_name; } if (results[j].address_components[i].types[0] == 'administrative_area_level_1') { contextVar.site[0].state = results[j].address_components[i].long_name; } if (results[j].address_components[i].types[0] == 'postal_code') { contextVar.site[0].postalCode = results[j].address_components[i].long_name; } } } } if (contextVar.checkinLatLngData && Array.isArray(contextVar.checkinLatLngData) && contextVar.checkinLatLngData.length > 0 && contextVar.checkinLatLngData[0].results && Array.isArray(contextVar.checkinLatLngData[0].results) && contextVar.checkinLatLngData[0].results.length > 0) { setSiteDetails(contextVar.checkinLatLngData[0].results) }

hasUpdatedLatLong.name: hasUpdatedLatLong
hasUpdatedLatLong.description: Use this for decision in workflow
hasUpdatedLatLong.processRule: contextVar.computeMode=='true' && contextVar.site != '' && contextVar.site.length>0 && typeof contextVar.site!='undefined' && typeof contextVar.site[0].longitude!='undefined' &&  contextVar.site[0].longitude!='' && typeof contextVar.site[0].latitude!='undefined' &&  contextVar.site[0].latitude!=''

getAddress.name: getAddress
getAddress.description: Provide some description for your network node
